backend/main.mo: Empty Motoko actor with no methods or logic.
feature_evidence.json: Metadata file listing implemented features, related frontend files, components, test IDs, and confidence levels.
frontend-file-summaries.txt: Prewritten summaries describing App.tsx, index.css, and tailwind.config.js contents for build reference.
frontend/index.css: Base Tailwind setup defining OKLCH color variables, dark mode overrides, and global styles.
frontend/index.html: HTML entry point with a root div and script loading the React app.
frontend/src/App.tsx: Full A1 Mart landing page with sticky nav, hero, about section, products, contact form, social links, and footer.
frontend/src/hooks/useActor.ts: React hook that creates and refreshes a backend actor based on Internet Identity authentication state.
frontend/src/hooks/useInternetIdentity.t: Provides Internet Identity authentication context, handling login, stored identity loading, and state management.
frontend/src/index.css: Brand-focused styling with dark green and cream theme plus custom components for navigation, buttons, cards, and layout.
frontend/src/main.tsx: React entry rendering App with Internet Identity and React Query providers.
frontend/tailwind.config.js: Configures Tailwind with dark mode, custom OKLCH color system, typography/animation plugins, and extended theme options for layout and components.
project_state.json: Defines project metadata and feature set for building a responsive singleâ€‘page marketing site for A1 Mart with sections, branding, and form requirements.
